title: Healthy 70yo editor decline which cognitive task

content.prompt: A healthy, seventy-year-old editor of a print magazine is likely to experience the greatest decline in which of the following cognitive tasks?

choices.label: Remembering who was the president of the United States in 1960
Quickly learning the process of editing and publishing an Internet-based magazine
Recalling the name and author of a favorite book
Explaining the process of magazine publishing before computers and the Internet

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
